intro.title: Need help? We're here for you!
intro.description: If you're going through a difficult situation, Amane+ allows you to submit a confidential help request. Each request is treated with seriousness, respect and transparency.
intro.trustDesc: Your information is protected and used only to process your request.

form.title: Help request
form.beneficiaryDesc: First fill in the beneficiary information, then choose the campaign type and related details.
form.locationErrorGeo: Geolocation is not available in this browser.
form.locationErrorDenied: Permission denied. Please enable location in settings.
form.locationErrorTimeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
form.shariahMasakin: Al Masakin (Needy: insufficient income for basic needs)
form.shariahGharimin: Al Gharimin (In debt: health or survival debts only)
form.acceptPhoto: For transparency, would the applicant agree to have their photo taken?
form.healthLifeThreatening: Is this a life-threatening emergency (critical within 24-48h)?
form.patientCmuCard: Does the patient have a CMU card? (patientHaveCmuCard)
form.patientUnableToPay: Is the patient completely unable to pay? (patientTotalityUnableToPay)
form.studentRegistered: Is the student already enrolled in an institution?
form.riskOfExclusion: Is there a risk of exclusion due to unpaid fees?
form.landTitle: Land with title deed or authorisation? (landHaveTitleDeedOrAuthorisation)
form.twoQuotes: At least 2 quotes from service providers? (areThereAtLeastTwoConflictingQuotesFromServiceProviders)
form.documentsDesc: Upload at least 2 documents from the list below (depending on campaign type).
form.commitmentDesc: Commit to the accuracy of the information provided.
form.certifyText: I certify on my honour that the information provided is accurate. I understand that any false declaration will result in immediate rejection of the request.
form.signatureDesc: Please sign with your finger in the box below to confirm your commitment.
form.successTitle: Your request has been successfully submitted!
form.successTeamReview: Our team will review your situation carefully and get back to you as soon as possible.
form.errorReconnect: Please sign in again to submit a help request.
form.errorSend: Unable to send the request. Please try again later.

hero.subtitle: The all-in-one Islamic platform for donations, zakat, takaful and halal investments.

spirituality.title: Live spirituality in the digital age
spirituality.description: Amane+ is an innovative technology solution that lets you live your religious values fully in the modern world. Our platform combines Islamic tradition with the latest technology to offer you an ethical, transparent and accessible financial experience. Whether you want to donate, calculate your zakat, invest in a halal way or protect yourself with Takaful, Amane+ supports you at every step of your spiritual financial journey.

ethicalWallet.title: An ethical wallet
ethicalWallet.description: Manage all your ethical financial services from a single platform. Donations, zakat, halal investments, savings and Takaful protection – everything is just a few clicks away. Our ethical wallet lets you track all your transactions, see your impact and meet your religious obligations with ease.

donations.title: Donations & Solidarity
donations.description: Make one-off or recurring donations to verified campaigns: health, education, clean water, food aid, orphans, and more.
donations.quote: The Prophet ﷺ said: "Charity never decreases wealth." (Muslim)
donations.trace: Every gesture is tracked through to its final impact.

zakat.title: Automated Zakat
zakat.description: Calculate and distribute your zakat easily with our automated system. Our smart calculator follows all Islamic principles and guides you step by step. You can then distribute your zakat to verified causes and track the impact of your contribution.

takaful.title: Takaful (Islamic Insurance)
takaful.description: Contribute to a mutual fund to support members in times of need — no interest, no speculation.
takaful.quote: The Prophet ﷺ said: "Believers, in their love, mercy and compassion for one another, are like one body." (Bukhari and Muslim)
takaful.community: A community that insures one another in a spirit of sharing.

invest.title: Halal Investments
invest.description: Put your money into projects that comply with Islamic finance and grow your income ethically.
invest.quote: The Prophet ﷺ said: "Seek what is lawful, for Allah only accepts what is lawful." (Tabarani)
invest.tagline: Invest with no compromise, in line with your values.
